Text: RE OPM October Cc Hi This is just a friendly reminder that I need your OPM hours surveys for October no later than today at pm If you have already sent the hours to me please disregard this message Thanks for your time and assistance Please call me with any questions Thanks Elizabeth Original Message From Webb Elizabeth Sent Thursday October AM To Webb Elizabeth Greif Donna Muzzy Charles T Dinari Sabra L DriscollErnest Marde L Lamadrid Victor Kinsey Lisa Sullivan Patti Williams Jason Trading Farmer Daren J Smith George F Olinger Kimberly S Jaquet Tammy Calcagno Suzanne Cc Superty Robert Nicholie Suzanne Saldana Roxanne Jackson Brandee Saldana Alex Subject OPM October Hi All Attached is the OPM Monthly Hours Survey for October I need this returned to me no later than next Monday October th at noon Please do the following Please click on your regions cost centers tab in the attached spreadsheet and enter the appropriate percentages of time that you and your employees spend on each of the tasks listed in the spreadsheet Please verify that the Charge Allocations listed in the spreadsheet are correct and that the correct percentages are allocated to each of the trading desks Please note that the percentages currently in the spreadsheet are from last month Please change any of these numbers as is appropriate to reflect Octobers activities Please make any other changes that may be needed regarding employees titles etc Please note that the spreadsheet is located on Ologisticsmanagementtime allocationOPM October Totals Thank you so much for your cooperation in this matter If you have any questions please let me know Thanks Elizabeth Elizabeth Webb File OPM October Totalsxls

Staffing Cc Hi All Please let me know if you have any new employees beginning next week or employees that are leaving this week I need this information by Friday October th at noon Thanks and please call me with any questions Elizabeth Elizabeth Webb

OPM October Cc Hi All Attached is the OPM Monthly Hours Survey for October I need this returned to me no later than next Monday October th at noon Please do the following Please click on your regions cost centers tab in the attached spreadsheet and enter the appropriate percentages of time that you and your employees spend on each of the tasks listed in the spreadsheet Please verify that the Charge Allocations listed in the spreadsheet are correct and that the correct percentages are allocated to each of the trading desks Please note that the percentages currently in the spreadsheet are from last month Please change any of these numbers as is appropriate to reflect Octobers activities Please make any other changes that may be needed regarding employees titles etc Please note that the spreadsheet is located on Ologisticsmanagementtime allocationOPM October Totals Thank you so much for your cooperation in this matter If you have any questions please let me know Thanks Elizabeth Elizabeth Webb

RE Extra Extra Cc Another name idea to vote on for the newsletter Logistically Speaking Original Message From Webb Elizabeth Sent Wednesday October AM To Lamadrid Victor Greif Donna Kinsey Lisa Sullivan Patti Olinger Kimberly S Smith George F Farmer Daren J Williams Jason Trading Dinari Sabra L DriscollErnest Marde L Muzzy Charles T Superty Robert Calcagno Suzanne Jaquet Tammy Cc Saldana Alex Jackson Brandee Showers Digna Garcia Clarissa Schrab Mark L Newton Lisbet Subject RE Extra Extra Thanks to all of you who have submitted information for the newsletter so far Please remember that I need all of your information and stories by next Monday August nd Also can you please add any comments and information about the upcoming move to Enron Center South and comment on such things as desk setup integration of commercial retail teams on the same floor any other move details you would like to add Additionally please vote on one of the following names for the newsletter Gas Logistics Gazette A Look at Logistics Logistics Light Logistics Monthly Or let me know any other name ideas ASAP and I can send those out for vote as well Thanks for your time and assistance Please contact me with any questions Thanks Elizabeth x Original Message From Webb Elizabeth Sent Tuesday October AM To Lamadrid Victor Greif Donna Kinsey Lisa Sullivan Patti Olinger Kimberly S Smith George F Farmer Daren J Williams Jason Trading Dinari Sabra L DriscollErnest Marde L Muzzy Charles T Superty Robert Calcagno Suzanne Jaquet Tammy Cc Saldana Alex Jackson Brandee Showers Digna Garcia Clarissa Schrab Mark L Newton Lisbet Subject Extra Extra Attention Logistics Managers Beginning in November I will begin publishing a Gas Logistics newsletter at the beginning of each month However I need news to put in the newsletter This is where I need your help Please distribute this email to the employees in your cost center I need the following news if you have any Department News Announcements Upcoming Events Any New Hires since August Birthdays please make any changes to the list I have on the attached document Enron in the News Industry News New Pipelines Asset Management Deals Please send me any news or information that you would like published in the November newsletter by Monday October nd Thanks for your assistance and input Please contact me with any questions Thanks Elizabeth Elizabeth Webb File logistics newsletterpub

Superty Robert Newton Lisbet Garcia Clarissa Schrab Mark L Subject Logistics PowerPoint presentation Hi All Per the discussion at todays staff meeting I would like you all to review the attached presentation and put in general information for your particular deskcost center in the respective slides I have one slide for each deskcost center called DeskCost Center X Information and another called Asset Management Deals if this is applicable to you Please return the attached presentation with your additions andor changes to me by Friday October th Please call me if you have any questions or concerns Also please feel free to utilize me as a resource for any PowerPoint presentations data gathering that you may need done Thanks Elizabeth Presentation is located on OlogisticsmanagementGas Logistics PowerPoint File Gas Logistics PowerPointppt Elizabeth Webb

November OPM Cc Hi All Attached is the OPM Monthly Hours Survey for November I need this returned to me no later than this Friday November at noon Please do the following Please click on your regions cost centers tab in the attached spreadsheet and enter the appropriate percentages of time that you and your employees spend on each of the tasks listed in the spreadsheet Please verify that the Charge Allocations listed in the spreadsheet are correct and that the correct percentages are allocated to each of the trading desks Please note that the percentages currently in the spreadsheet are from last month Please change any of these numbers as is appropriate to reflect Octobers activities Please make any other changes that may be needed regarding employees titles etc Please note that the spreadsheet is located on Ologisticsmanagementtime allocationOPM November Totals Thank you so much for your cooperation in this matter If you have any questions please let me know Thanks Elizabeth x

Logistics PowerPoint Presentation Cc Hi All Attached is a general Logistics PowerPoint presentation that can be presented to customers or whoever you need to present information about Enron North America Gas Logistics to The presentation contains a section about each of the desks andor regions and cost centers Therefore you can copy and paste some of the slides into a smaller presentation to fit your individual needs The presentation is also located on O LogisticsManagementPresentationsGas Logistics Presentationppt Thanks and please contact me with any questions Regards Elizabeth Elizabeth Webb

RE Texas logistics info Cc Daren Have you had a chance to complete the Texas logistics information for the PowerPoint presentation You can just write what you would like me to say in a reply to this email I can put the text in the presentation I need this info ASAP so that I can send the presentation to all of the Logistics managers Thanks Elizabeth Original Message From Webb Elizabeth Sent Tuesday October AM To Farmer Daren J Cc Calcagno Suzanne Subject Texas logistics info Daren I need some general information from you about Texas logistics for the Logistics PowerPoint presentation Can you please get this info to me by tomorrow Wednesday October at pm The slide that I need you to complete is Texas Gas Logistics Information Thanks Elizabeth File Gas Logistics PowerPointppt Elizabeth Webb

Monthly Budget vs Actual Comparison Reports TEXAS Cc Daren Attached are the Texas Monthly Budget vs Actual Comparison Reports for June July August Please contact me with any questions Thanks Elizabeth Elizabeth Webb

FW HR Headcount Report Cc Jason Effective November your salary should be transferred to Hunter Shivelys cost center I need you to enter this new cost center into your timesheet The way that you do this is to enter the new cost center number into the space that says Rec CCtr for November th Also you will need to manually enter hours worked for each day so that SAP will pick up your time and expenses and put them in the new cost center You will also need to do the same thing for November th Please write me back and let me know that you have received this message Also please call me with any additional questions Thanks for your time and assistance in this matter Elizabeth Webb x Original Message From Heinrich Brian Sent Monday November PM To Webb Elizabeth Cc Superty Robert Snow Karen Subject RE HR Headcount Report Elizabeth The best way to get Jasons salary transferred to the correct cost center since it is only one pay period back is to have him go into his SAP timesheet and have him code his time to the new cost center This way the system SAP will correct all his payroll costs automatically If you need help explaining to him how to do this let me know Thanks Brian Original Message From Webb Elizabeth Sent Monday November PM To Heinrich Brian Cc Superty Robert Snow Karen Subject FW HR Headcount Report Brian Please note that Jason Williams should be transferred out of CC effective November and put in Hunter Shivelys Co CC Thanks Elizabeth Original Message From Choate Heather Sent Monday November PM To Webb Elizabeth Subject HR Headcount Report Elizabeth Yes per the email below I am asking Karen to to transfer Jason Williams out of this Cost Center and into Hunter Shivelys Co CC I have not heard back from her since this email but plan on calling her at pm if I have still not heard any comment on my request Heather Original Message From Choate Heather Sent Wednesday November PM To Campos Karen E Cc Heinrich Brian Webb Elizabeth De Jesus Frank Hennessy Sonia Saldana Alex Romero Araceli Jackson Brandee Dade Dorothy Pena Yolanda Subject HR Headcount Report Karen Forgot the attachment see below I have reviewed the HR Report you sent me and am attaching the following corrections I was however missing the following Company and Cost Centers and need to receive these reports as well If you could send these ASAP for review I would greatly appreciate it Missing Cost Centers E Bob Superty Owner Project Aruba Jason Williams should be transferred out to effective Nov Martha Stevens Owner South America Risk Peggy Hedstrom Owner Calgary Operations Peggy Hedstrom Owner Canada IT Development Peggy Hedstrom Owner Canada IT Development Support Bob Hall wants me to make sure our headcount is true and accurate If you would then please advise when you could send me a clean report with all of our corrections made I would appreciate it File Reportxls Thank you Heather Choate x
